name: df-mapd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cmpd, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), cmpt(s2, cfv(clss, cfv(cfv(cdvh, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), crab(s3, cfv(clfn, cfv(cfv(cdvh, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cfv(cfv(cfv(coch, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(cfv(coch, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(clk, cfv(cfv(cdvh, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cv(s3)))), cfv(cfv(clk, cfv(cfv(cdvh, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cv(s3))), wss(cfv(cfv(cfv(coch, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(clk, cfv(cfv(cdvh, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cv(s3))), cv(s2))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mapd =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(LSubSp `((DVecH ` s0)` s1))‚Ü¶ { s3 ‚àà(LFnl `((DVecH ` s0)` s1))|((((ocH ` s0)` s1)`(((ocH ` s0)` s1)`((LKer `((DVecH ` s0)` s1))` s3)))=((LKer `((DVecH ` s0)` s1))` s3)‚àß(((ocH ` s0)` s1)`((LKer `((DVecH ` s0)` s1))` s3))‚äÜ s2)})))
comment: Extend class notation with a one-to-one onto ( ~ mapd1o ), order-preserving ( ~ mapdord ) map, called a projectivity (definition of projectivity in [Baer] p. 40), from subspaces of vector space H to those subspaces of the dual space having functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2015.)
